name: Rebecca
text: On Play: If there is a cost 8 or greater character in play, draw 1 card. Then reveal up to 2 cost 7 or lower (Dressrosa) type characters other than "Rebecca" from your hand. Play one of them as active, then if the other has a cost of 4 or lower play it as rested.

effect.text: If there is a cost 8 or greater character in play, draw 1 card. Then reveal up to 2 cost 7 or lower (Dressrosa) type characters other than "Rebecca" from your hand. Play one of them as active, then if the other has a cost of 4 or lower play it as rested.
